title: Remove recording promise and emphasize active participation in session copy

requirements.summary: Update landing-page text to remove any promise of a session recording and replace it with copy emphasizing active engagement, note-taking, and intentionally no recording.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx, the sentence "The session is recorded and sent to you afterward for your own reflection." is removed or rewritten so it does not imply a recording will be provided.

In the "After the Session" subsection of frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx, the paragraph "You will receive a recording of the session within 24 hours..." is removed and replaced with copy that: (a) emphasizes active engagement/presence during the session, (b) explicitly invites note-taking, and (c) states that recordings are intentionally not provided to support full presence.
No other landing-page sections contain any remaining promise or implication that a recording will be provided after the session.

file_operations.description: Copy-only edits: remove all references to providing/sending a recording and replace with English copy that (1) states the session requires active engagement and participation during the call, (2) welcomes participants to take notes to integrate what is learned, and (3) clearly explains recordings are intentionally not provided to prevent disengagement/"listen later" behavior. Also quickly verify within this file that no remaining text implies a recording will be provided.
